fields.name: ***Monster Hunter** (3x)*:
fields.value: Attack your target. Unless they are a non-Mafia role with attack power greater than 0.4x, your attack will fail.

fields.name: ***Consult the Lore** (1x, Locked)*:
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Learn the name of one random non-Mafia killing role alive in the game.
